name: Unplanned AMOUR
description:
Kyra is a 29 year old woman who's still not married and is not interested in romance. She doesn't think it's important as of now. But her mother is insistent in getting her married. How will she cope? Will she be able to find the one? Or will she stay single again for another year?

Features:

- 30+k words
- 3 romancable characters
- 6 endings (good and bad ending for each character)
- Original sprites and art
- Some original music
- Full credits in .txt

Original thread from LSF:

http://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=1...

EDIT: I've uploaded the fixed version for all platforms for sprites not showing. :D
